Class ArchiveWebsocketService

java.lang.Object
com.laoluade.ingestor.ao3.services.ArchiveWebsocketService
@Service public class ArchiveWebsocketService extends Object

This class is the Spring Boot service responsible for running live websocket feeds for active sessions.

This class uses the following settings from the application.properties file to configure itself:

  • archiveServer.websocket.sendIntervalMilli

All archiveServer.websocket settings have a class attribute counterpart.

    private final Integer
    sendIntervalMilli
    This attribute represents the interval in milliseconds to wait before publishing a websocket message.

    sessionService
    This attribute represents the injected ArchiveSessionService.
    private final org.springframework.messaging.simp.SimpMessagingTemplate
    websocketTemplate
    This attribute represents the SimpMessagingTemplate used to public websocket messages.

  • Constructor Details

    • ArchiveWebsocketService

      public ArchiveWebsocketService(ArchiveLogService logService, ArchiveMessageService messageService, ArchiveSessionService sessionService, org.springframework.messaging.simp.SimpMessagingTemplate websocketTemplate, @Value("${archiveServer.websocket.sendIntervalMilli}") Integer sendIntervalMilli)

      This constructor injects services and values into the archive websocket service.

      Parameters:
      logService - The injected logging service.
      messageService - The injected message service.
      sessionService - The injected session service.
      websocketTemplate - The injected SimpMessagingTemplate.
      sendIntervalMilli - Size of message publishing interval in seconds.

  • Method Details

    • runLiveSessionFeed

      @Async("archiveServerAsyncExecutor") public void runLiveSessionFeed(String sessionId) throws InterruptedException

      This method runs an asynchronous task that publishes session updates in intervals of milliseconds.

      Parameters:
      sessionId - The session ID to routinely check for updates.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - If the Thread.sleep() line is interrupted mid-execution.
